sentences.english: Time is respected by not wasting it.
sentences.chinese: 不浪费时间是值得尊重的。

sentences.english: It is not cogitation; it is a waste of life.
sentences.chinese: 其实没必要想那么多，那只是在浪费生命。

sentences.english: Never waste too much time on some new words and single sentences.
sentences.chinese: 不要在单个词或单句上浪费太多时间。

sentences.english: I kno , they Want me to study hard and not to aste time.
sentences.chinese: 我明白他们想让我努力学习，不要浪费时间。

sentences.english: Much of the body's energy is wasted uselessly .
sentences.chinese: 多数的身体的能量就这样白白浪费了。

sentences.english: Playing computer games all day lavishes parents' hard-earned money.
sentences.chinese: 整天玩电脑游戏浪费父母的血汗钱。

sentences.english: It is hardly surprising if students sometimes find this kind of make-believe question a waste of their time.
sentences.chinese: 不难看到，学生有时觉得这类问题是在浪费时间。

sentences.english: It is waste of time, admonishing you.
sentences.chinese: 劝告你简直是浪费工夫。

sentences.english: A clean house is a sign of a misspent life.
sentences.chinese: 一间干净的房子是一个浪费的人生的标志。

sentences.english: She fritters away all her money on cheap clothes.
sentences.chinese: 她老是买便宜的衣服，把钱都浪费了。

sentences.english: Skyscrapers are also lavish consumers, and wasters, of electirc power.
sentences.chinese: 摩天大楼还是电能的过度消费者与浪费者。

sentences.english: We must keep away excessive lavish and .
sentences.chinese: 我们必须避免过分放纵和铺张浪费。

sentences.english: I would not waste my time pursing that.
sentences.chinese: 如果我是你，不会将时间浪费在这里。

sentences.english: "The cancer patient usually does not have this much time to waste, "Silber said.
sentences.chinese: “癌症患者通常没有这么多时间浪费，”西尔伯说。

sentences.english: You have a one-way ticket, don't waste it.
sentences.chinese: 人生在世，你只有一张单程票，别浪费瞭它。

sentences.english: The final exams are coming up. We cannot afford to waste even a minute.
sentences.chinese: 快要期终考试了，我们现在一分钟也不能浪费。

definition: valuable/precious/to value/to treasure/to set store by
saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
to delay/to hold up/to waste time/to interfere with
to use sth to the full/to make the best use of everything
